trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_LoadGrammarCompleted" name="LoadGrammarCompleted" href=""></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Adja meg az adatait a <xref uid="langword_csharp_LoadGrammarCompleted" name="LoadGrammarCompleted" href=""> </xref> az esemény egy <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> vagy <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> objektum.

trans-unit.source: An instance of `LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs` is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object raises its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> or the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> object raises its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Példányának `LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs` jön létre, amikor a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>objektum vált ki a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>vagy a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>objektum vált ki a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarCompleted>esemény.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: The events are raised when calls to the `LoadGrammarAsync` methods complete.
trans-unit.target: Az események aktiválódnak amikor hívások a `LoadGrammarAsync` módszerek végezze el.

trans-unit.source: To obtain information about the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object that was loaded, access the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs.Grammar%2A> property in the handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: A rájuk vonatkozó információ beszerzéséhez a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektum, amely lett betöltve, a hozzáférés a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs.Grammar%2A>tulajdonsága a következő eseményhez: a kezelő.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs.Grammar%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer encounters an exception during the operation, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property is set to the exception and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Loaded%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> may be `false`.
trans-unit.target: Ha a felismerő tapasztal kivétel történt a művelet során a <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>tulajdonsága a kivétel és a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Loaded%2A>tulajdonsága a társított <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>lehet `false`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Loaded%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> object that has completed loading.

If the recognizer encounters an exception during the operation, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property is set to the exception and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Loaded%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> may be `false`.
trans-unit.target: Ha a felismerő tapasztal kivétel történt a művelet során a <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>tulajdonsága a kivétel és a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Loaded%2A>tulajdonsága a társított <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>lehet `false`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Loaded%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> that was loaded by the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> , amely a felismerőbeállítást lett betöltve.
